one_reviews_text: What i see on their website and what this app shows are completely different. I got it for the purpose of overcoming fear of flying based on the website they show a commercial airplane cabin seat next to a window. There are only 3 choices on this app Bees, Roaches, and Spiders.

review_title: It does help people with phobias
one_reviews_text:
Recently subjected a friend to this app, the gradual process and calm voice really helps.
If you or people around you are terrorized by spiders, cockroaches, ants/bees, try this.
I would really like having the voice in french, other than that, it is perfect !
I played this for my commuinty and it helped a lot of them just watching it. This  isn't for everyone but for some, it could be life changing. Keep up the great work!
It's a good start if you have any fears over insects, but that's exactly what it is, a way for people to get over there fears, don't buy this expecting to play a game, because that's not what it is.
review_feedback: Thank you! Yes, it is not meant to be a game. We tried to make it clear in the description and screenshots, etc, but some people still get confused.

one_reviews_text: There is research being done on the potential for apps like these to act as exposure therapy for specific phobias. I would love to see data on how well this app actually works. If the data supports it, you could actually recommend using this in a psychiatric setting to desensitise people. For now, it's simply an interesting demo.
review_feedback: Thank you! There has been a lot of research into VR exposure therapy, which is what we tried to base Fearless on. Yes, more research to be done!
